io.discloader.discloader.entity.message

Interface IReaction


  • public interface IReaction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean didReact() 
      int getCount() 
      IEmoji getEmoji() 
      IMessage getMessage() 
      CompletableFuture<List<IUser>> getUsers() 
      CompletableFuture<Void> removeReaction()
      Deletes the reaction the current user has made for the message.
      CompletableFuture<Void> removeUserReaction(IUser user)
      Deletes another user's reaction.
      This method requires the Permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES permission to be present on the current user.

    • Method Detail

      • removeUserReaction

        CompletableFuture<Void> removeUserReaction(IUser user)
        Deletes another user's reaction.
        This method requires the Permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES permission to be present on the current user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user in which you are removing the reaction for.
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with no value if successful.
        Throws:
        PermissionsException

      • removeReaction

        CompletableFuture<Void> removeReaction()
        Deletes the reaction the current user has made for the message.
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with no value if successful.
